summary: Ahmed Gbadamosi, PA-C, had his physician assistant license suspended for a minimum of one year and was fined $5,000. This disciplinary action was taken due to his fraudulent or deceptive efforts to obtain and maintain his license, unprofessional conduct, and willfully making false representations on multiple licensure and credentialing applications. He failed to disclose a 2014 criminal trespass conviction and misrepresented circumstances surrounding employment terminations.
